title: Volunteer
name: LEAP volunteer in Langara:
detail:
new student orientation per term, such as introduce our campus, and the LEAP program, answering question of life and education.
 In class introduce,such as visit LEAP 3 classes for about 7-10 minutes, to talk to them about the activities and events put on by the International Education Office. In particular,  share about some up the upcoming events that are listed on the IE Events calendar and to encourage students to sign up. We'd also like you to show them what kind of information goes out in the IE Newsletter.
LEAP test welcom, such as show them where is the test sign in place, help them sign in and answer question.

title: Volunteer
name: International Student Orientation Volunteer
detail: welcoming and checking in students when they arrive; handing out orientation packages; directing students to the correct location; serving lunch; answering general questions from students; interacting/ mingling with students; cleaning up and rearranging the room
